name: Contract Digger
description:
Contract Digger lets you explore the mines below a small village. The mysterious Contractor wants gems and rewards you with coins, who could say no to that! You are not rushed in this game, however, if you return with enough gems in time, your reward will be significantly bigger.

---------------

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button - digging (TIP: Strike weak point)
  • A-D - Movement
  • SPACEBAR - jump, hold for jetpack
  • E - open UI when prompted.

TIP: If you get stuck, R icon on top right restarts the game.

---------------

CHANGELOG

- no changes

---------------
